Package com.saic.uicds.core.em.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlertService
    The Alert service manages Alert work products that conform to the CAP version 1.1 specification.
    BroadcastService
    The Broadcast Service provides operations to send messages to joined cores.
    IAPService
    The IAP Service manages Incident Action Plan (IAP) and ICS form work products.
    IncidentCommandService
    The IncidentCommandService manages ICS and MACS type work products that associate Resource Instances to Resource Profiles in an organizational structure.
    IncidentManagementService
    The Incident Management Service manages the lifecycle of an incident and the sharing of incidents.
    LEITSCService
    The UICDS LEITSC Service provides the ability for a CAD system to post Detailed CFS messages to the UICDS core, when an incident is created, updated, and cleared.
    MapService
    The Map Service manages Layer and MapViewContext type work products.
    ResourceManagementService
    The ResourceManagementService uses the CommunicationsService to send EDXL-DE messages to ResourceInstances on other cores.
    SensorService
    The SensorService manages SOS type work products that are OGC-SOS documents.
    TaskingService
    The TaskingService manages Tasking type work products.
